verbs.description: [ARG0: The former Patriots defensive end] [V: said] [ARG1: that the new rules reflect the owners ' fear of their bottom line , as well as President Donald Trump , not concerns about patriotism] .
The former Patriots defensive end said that [ARG2: the new rules] [V: reflect] [ARG1: the owners ' fear of their bottom line , as well as President Donald Trump , not concerns about patriotism] .
